conversation.content:
Category-Id: f94505150d11400e9a1082f
Name: Submit Expense
Description: The intent to submit expenses incurred by an employee for work-related activities.
Slot:
	Id: cb3fcd6e0fa648f1a8e8f7e
	Entity-Name: expense_category
	Description: The type or category of the expense being submitted.
	Example-values: ['travel', 'meals', 'accommodation', 'office supplies', 'entertainment']

	Id: 5c9bdfae8a334e67a851dbc
	Entity-Name: amount
	Description: The monetary value of the expense being submitted.

	Id: b3fc10f326c349f3b4ed299
	Entity-Name: date_of_expense
	Description: The date when the expense was incurred.
	Example-values: ['2022-01-01', '2022-02-15', '2022-03-30', '2022-04-15']

	Id: 31e5cedf86b14f93a5c1beb
	Entity-Name: receipt_attachment
	Description: A digital copy or image of the receipt for the expense.



Category-Id: 2b0babf8b1d940e3a3234d9
Name: Add Receipt
Description: The intent to add a receipt or other documentation to support an expense claim.
Slot:
	Id: 4c186fb5317d4dd0b299be3
	Entity-Name: receipt_type
	Description: The type of receipt or document being added.

	Id: 3277633372984ac29bbfe28
	Entity-Name: amount
	Description: The total amount listed on the receipt.

	Id: 234323309e234f76a430702
	Entity-Name: currency
	Description: The currency in which the receipt is denominated.

	Id: c0fc06140bf14a5097595ee
	Entity-Name: date
	Description: The date on which the expense was incurred.



Category-Id: f882139027be4f37a359a8d
Name: Request Advance
Description: The intent to request an advance for an upcoming expense.
Slot:
	Id: a032aaedd3234ad0a11466a
	Entity-Name: employee_id
	Description: The unique identifier for the employee making the request.

	Id: 305039f8ea244ee09507d08
	Entity-Name: amount
	Description: The amount of money requested as an advance.
	Example-values: ['$500', '$1000', '$1500', '$2000']

	Id: 6660ddfe695b400cb8ceeee
	Entity-Name: expense_description
	Description: A brief description of the upcoming expense.



Category-Id: 1355dfabf5ab4fd8b29163d
Name: View Policy
Description: The intent to view the company's expense reimbursement policy.
Slot:
	Id: a9eb8574af024174aea31cf
	Entity-Name: policy_type
	Description: The type of expense policy to view.

	Id: 0606fbbd2a434df8bc2e22e
	Entity-Name: policy_year
	Description: The year of the expense policy to view.



Category-Id: a67e44b918b442a9b66b632
Name: Contact Approver
Description: The intent to contact the person responsible for approving expense reports.
Slot:
	Id: 7d144389b48342fe9238c0e
	Entity-Name: approver_name
	Description: The name of the person responsible for approving expense reports.



Category-Id: 77dac81b399d4b05bf4f493
Name: N/A
Description: Matches none of the other categories
